From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Asturian

[edit]

Verb

[edit]

funcionar (first-person singular indicative present funciono, past participle funcionáu)

  1. to work, function
    Synonym: furrular

Conjugation

[edit]
Conjugation of funcionar
infinitive funcionar
gerund funcionando
past participle m funcionáu, f funcionada, n funcionao, m pl funcionaos, f pl funcionaes
person first singular
yo 		second singular
tu 		third singular
él/elli 		first plural
nosotros/nós 		second plural
vosotros/vós 		third plural
ellos
indicative present funciono funciones funciona funcionamos funcionáis funcionen
imperfect funcionaba funcionabes funcionaba funcionábemos, funcionábamos funcionabeis, funcionabais funcionaben
preterite funcioné funcionasti, funcionesti funcionó funcionemos funcionastis, funcionestis funcionaron
pluperfect funcionare, funcionara funcionares, funcionaras funcionare, funcionara funcionáremos, funcionáramos funcionareis, funcionarais funcionaren, funcionaran
future funcionaré funcionarás funcionará funcionaremos funcionaréis funcionarán
conditional funcionaría funcionaríes funcionaría funcionaríemos, funcionaríamos funcionaríeis, funcionaríais funcionaríen
subjunctive present funcione funciones, funcionas funcione funcionemos funcionéis funcionen, funcionan
imperfect funcionare, funcionara funcionares, funcionaras funcionare, funcionara funcionáremos, funcionáramos funcionareis, funcionarais funcionaren, funcionaran
imperative — funciona — — funcionái —

Derived terms

[edit]
  • funcionamientu

Further reading

[edit]
  • “funcionar”, in Diccionariu de la llingua asturiana [Dictionary of the Asturian Language] (in Asturian), 1ª edición, Academia de la Llingua Asturiana, 2000, →ISBN
  • Xosé Lluis García Arias (2002–2004), “funcionar”, in Diccionario general de la lengua asturiana [General Dictionary of the Asturian Language] (in Spanish), Editorial Prensa Asturiana, →ISBN

Catalan

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central) [fun.si.uˈna]
  • IPA(key): (Balearic) [fun.si.oˈna]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [fun.si.oˈnaɾ]
  • Audio (Barcelona):(file)
  • Rhymes: -a(ɾ)

Verb

[edit]

funcionar (first-person singular present funciono, first-person singular preterite funcioní, past participle funcionat); root stress: (Central, Valencia, Balearic) /o/

  1. to work, function

Conjugation

[edit]

gerund funcionant
past participle masculine feminine
singular funcionat funcionada
plural funcionats funcionades
person singular plural

vós 		ells/elles

imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — funciona funcioni funcionem funcioneu funcionin

Derived terms

[edit]
  • funcionament

Further reading

[edit]
  • “funcionar”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “funcionar”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “funcionar” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “funcionar” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

Ido

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Derived from funciono +‎ -ar and borrowed from English function, French fonctionner, German funktionieren, Italian funzionare, Russian функциони́ровать (funkcionírovatʹ), Spanish funcionar.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /funt͡si̯oˈnar/

Verb

[edit]

funcionar (present funcionas, past funcionis, future funcionos, conditional funcionus, imperative funcionez)

  1. (intransitive) to function (all senses): to function, act (as)
  2. (intransitive) to perform the duties
  3. (intransitive) to fill an office
  4. (intransitive) to work properly (of machinery, etc.)

Conjugation

[edit]
Conjugation of funcionar
present past future
infinitive funcionar funcionir funcionor
tense funcionas funcionis funcionos
conditional funcionus — —
imperative funcionez — —
adjective active participle funcionanta funcioninta funciononta
adverbial active participle funcionante funcioninte funciononte
nominal
active participle 		singular funcionanto funcioninto funciononto
plural funcionanti funcioninti funciononti

Portuguese

[edit]

Alternative forms

[edit]
  • funccionar (pre-standardization spelling)

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from French fonctionner (“to function; to work”), from fonction + -er, from Latin fūnctiōnem (“function”). Equivalent to função +‎ -ar.

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /fũ.si.oˈna(ʁ)/ [fũ.sɪ.oˈna(h)], (faster pronunciation) /fũ.sjoˈna(ʁ)/ [fũ.sjoˈna(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /fũ.si.oˈna(ʁ)/ [fũ.sɪ.oˈna(h)], (faster pronunciation) /fũ.sjoˈna(ʁ)/ [fũ.sjoˈna(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /fũ.si.oˈna(ɾ)/ [fũ.sɪ.oˈna(ɾ)], (faster pronunciation) /fũ.sjoˈna(ɾ)/
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /fũ.si.oˈna(ʁ)/ [fũ.sɪ.oˈna(χ)], (faster pronunciation) /fũ.sjoˈna(ʁ)/ [fũ.sjoˈna(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /fũ.si.oˈna(ɻ)/ [fũ.sɪ.oˈna(ɻ)], (faster pronunciation) /fũ.sjoˈna(ɻ)/
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /fũ.sjuˈnaɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /fũ.sjuˈnaɾ/
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /fũ.sjuˈna.ɾi/

  • Audio (Portugal (Porto)):(file)
  • Hyphenation: fun‧ci‧o‧nar

Verb

[edit]

funcionar (first-person singular present funciono, first-person singular preterite funcionei, past participle funcionado)

  1. to work; to function
    Synonym: (informal, clipping) funfar
    • 1934, Graciliano Ramos, chapter XI, in S. Bernardo‎[1], 1st edition, Rio de Janeiro: Ariel, Editora Ltda., page 68:
      […] Padilha jurou por todos os santos que a escola funccionava normalmente e que fazia cortar coração deixar tantas crianças sem o pão do saber.
      […] Padilha swore by all saints that the school functioned normally and that it broke hearts to leave so many children without the bread of knowledge.

Derived terms

[edit]
  • funfar

Related terms

[edit]
  • função
  • funcional
  • funcionalidade
  • funcionalismo
  • funcionamento
  • funcionário

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From función +‎ -ar.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /funθjoˈnaɾ/ [fũn̟.θjoˈnaɾ] (Spain)
  • IPA(key): /funsjoˈnaɾ/ [fũn.sjoˈnaɾ] (Latin America, Philippines)
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: fun‧cio‧nar

Verb

[edit]

funcionar (first-person singular present funciono, first-person singular preterite funcioné, past participle funcionado)

  1. (intransitive) to work, to function

Conjugation

[edit]

singular funcionado funcionada

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.
